CustomField.description: CC BWRG Pricing Model Weighted Score Automatic
CustomField.formula: CASE(Pricing_Model__c, '(1) Ad Spent', 1 * Pricing_Model_Weight__c, '(2) % of Transaction', 2 * Pricing_Model_Weight__c, '(3) Subscription', 3 * Pricing_Model_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Revenue Model Weighted Score
